sentence.Network_en: Isolationism is a strictly national policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 隔离主义是一顶严格的国家政策.

sentence.Network_en: Behind this lay the sentiment of isolationism and a desire for peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这背后,藏着孤立主义和希望和平的心理.

sentence.Network_en: Moral exuberance had inspired both overinvolvement and isolationism.
sentence.Network_cn: 精神上偏激引起了过多承担义务和孤立主义.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 什么是孤立主义（isolationism）(Isolationism)　　孤立主义（isolationism）是一种外交政策。它通常由防务和经济上的两方面政策组成。

list.abs: all the forces of isolationism would have been aroused if any part of interchanges had transpired .来往的电文，只要其中任何一部分稍有泄露，国内所有的孤立主义势力就一定对总统群起而攻之。
newspapers and the forming of american isolationism diplomatic policy ., 报纸与美国孤立主义外交的形成.
It is our insurance policy against isolationism ., 这是我们反对孤立主义的保护性政策.
But we must reject isolationism and its companion , protectionism ., 但是我们必须拒绝孤立主义与保护主义.

entry.tran: 孤立主义(指避免与别国关系过密或在别国之间的冲突中持中立态度)
entry.def: If you refer to isolationism, you are referring to a country's policy of avoiding close relationships with other countries and of not taking sides in disputes between other countries.

means.word_mean: 1. a policy of nonparticipation in international economic and political relations

auth_sentence.content: Isolationism was replaced by war and war by Cold War.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Isolationism was replaced by war and war by Cold War.

auth_sentence.content: The effect was the narrowing of cultural exchange and more suspicion and isolationism.
auth_sentence.res_content: The effect was the narrowing of cultural exchange and more suspicion and isolationism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The effect was the narrowing of cultural exchange and more suspicion and isolationism.

auth_sentence.content: Rising isolationism does not surprise Council on Foreign Relations Studies director James Lindsay.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rising isolationism does not surprise Council on Foreign Relations Studies director James Lindsay.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rising isolationism does not surprise Council on Foreign Relations Studies director James Lindsay.

sentences.en: Isolationism is a strictly national policy.
